)is a sacred Buddhist mountain located in

Jiuhua Mountain stands at 1342 meters, and is associated with the Dizang Bodhisattva. During the Buddhist golden era in China, more than  200 temples graced the slopes of this mountain. However, there are currently only 50 temples remaining.
You can arrive by train to Tongling or Chizhou. There are coach buses directly to Mount Jiuhua.

value: Zhuhai - the sea of bamboo outside the village of Minyuan (on the path to Tiantai Peak)
